name: Flat Blocks Classic
author: timnicholson
description: Flat Blocks Classic is a child theme of Flat Blocks, which is a modern “flat” style theme with a nice color palette, full and wide width support, and support for the new “Full Site Editing” in WordPress. This theme displays right sidebars by default, but can be overriden with post and page templates. It also places a shortened page excerpt in the page header as a nice extra touch.
